item.title: 【AI Meets Vector Databases: Redefining Data Retrieval in the Age of Intelligence】AI符合矢量数据库：在智能时代重新定义数据检索
item.description:

Ever wish we could search the internet not with just keywords, but with actual meaning, like what we really meant to say? That’s the magic happening when AI teams up with vector databases.

Traditional databases are great for clean, structured stuff, like spreadsheets. But most of the data we create today? It’s messy and unstructured: think tweets, photos, voice notes, even memes. That’s where AI comes in. It’s amazing at understanding all that chaos, but it needs a smart system to store and search through it.

】

item.title: 【Java Virtual Threads and Scaling】Java虚拟线程和缩放
item.description:
【

Java Virtual Threads were introduced in JDK 19 as a preview feature as part of Project Loom, but they are fully supported starting from JDK 21 and beyond (JDK 24 includes further refinements). 

Virtual threads primarily help developers by simplifying concurrent programming — eliminating the need to choose between synchronous and reactive models, and reducing the complexity of working with NIO (non-blocking I/O) APIs. They seamlessly translate traditionally blocking operations such as I/O calls, synchronization, and thread sleeping into efficient, non-blocking operations under the hood, while allowing developers to write code in a straightforward, blocking style.

】

在JDK 19中引入了Java虚拟线程作为项目织机的一部分，但它们是从JDK 21及以后开始的（JDK 24包括进一步的细化）。 

虚拟线程主要通过简化并发编程来帮助开发人员 - 消除了在同步模型和反应性模型之间进行选择的需求，并降低了使用NIO（非块I/O）API的复杂性。他们无缝地翻译了传统上阻止操作，例如I/O呼叫，同步和线程，并在引擎盖下的高效，非阻滞操作中，同时允许开发人员以直接的，阻止的样式编写代码。

item.title: 【Unlocking the Benefits of a Private API in AWS API Gateway】解锁AWS API网关中私人API的好处
item.description:
【

AWS API Gateway is a managed service to create, publish, and manage APIs. It serves as a bridge between your applications and backend services. When creating APIs for our backend services, we tend to open it up using public IPs. Yes, we do authenticate and authorize access. However, oftentimes it is seen that a particular API is meant for internal applications only. In such cases it would be great to declare these as private.

Public APIs expose your services to a broader audience over the internet and thus come with risks related to data exposure and unauthorized access. On the other hand, private APIs are meant for internal consumption only. This provides an additional layer of security and eliminates the risk of potential data theft and unauthorized access.

】

AWS API网关是一项托管服务，可创建，发布和管理API。它是您的应用程序和后端服务之间的桥梁。在为我们的后端服务创建API时，我们倾向于使用公共IPS开放它。是的，我们确实对访问权限进行身份验证并授权。但是，通常情况下，特定的API仅用于内部应用。在这种情况下，将其宣布为私人是很棒的。

公共API通过Internet向更广泛的受众展示您的服务，因此会带来与数据曝光和未经授权访问有关的风险。另一方面，私有API仅用于内部消费。这提供了额外的安全层，并消除了潜在数据盗用和未经授权的访问的风险。

item.title: 【How to Build Scalable Mobile Apps With React Native: A Step-by-Step Guide】如何使用React Antial构建可扩展的移动应用程序：逐步指南
item.description:
【

Siloed development teams, fragmented code, and the relentless pressure to keep pace with two distinct platforms — these realities have long affected mobile app development. However, with platforms like React Native, developers have a robust solution for cross-platform apps with native-like features, offering consistent UI/UX across Android and iOS. 

Its "write-once, deploy everywhere" methodology has enabled all businesses, from startups to established enterprises, to maintain and refine a unified codebase for their apps. The impact? Reduced development costs, faster market entry, increased agility, and streamlined future updates and maintenance. This write-up will dig into the process of building cross-platform applications with React Native, exploring the key steps and best practices for successful implementation.

】

孤立的开发团队，零散的代码以及与两个不同平台保持步伐的不懈压力 - 这些现实长期以来影响了移动应用程序开发。但是，借助React Native等平台，开发人员为具有类似于本机的功能的跨平台应用程序提供了强大的解决方案，并在Android和iOS上提供一致的UI/UX。 

它的“写入，部署到处都可以部署”方法使从初创企业到建立企业的所有业务都可以维护和完善其应用程序的统一代码库。影响？降低了开发成本，更快的市场进入，提高敏捷性以及简化了未来的更新和维护。本文章将深入研究跨平台应用程序与 React satern ，探索成功实施的关键步骤和最佳实践。

item.title: 【Issue and Present Verifiable Credentials With Spring Boot and Android】发行并提供带有弹簧靴和Android的可验证凭证
item.description:
【

As digital identity ecosystems evolve, the ability to issue and verify digital credentials in a secure, privacy-preserving, and interoperable manner has become increasingly important. Verifiable Credentials (VCs) offer a W3C-standardized way to present claims about a subject, such as identity attributes or qualifications, in a tamper-evident and cryptographically verifiable format. Among the emerging formats, Selective Disclosure JSON Web Tokens (SD-JWTs) stand out for enabling holders to share only selected parts of a credential, while ensuring its authenticity can still be verified.

In this article, we demonstrate the issuance and presentation of Verifiable Credentials using the SD-JWT format, leveraging Spring Boot microservices on the backend and a Kotlin-based Android application acting as the wallet on the client side.

】
